code: import*as axios from"axios";var instance=axios.create({withCredentials:true,baseURL:"https://social-network.samuraijs.com/api/1.0/",headers:{"API-KEY":"edd374dd-87c3-43d5-9f84-18ff67372711"}});export var usersAPI={getUsers:function getUsers(){var currentPage=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;var pageSize=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:10;return instance.get("users?page=".concat(currentPage,"&count=").concat(pageSize)).then(function(response){return response.data;});}};export var followAPI={unfollow:function unfollow(id){return instance.delete("follow/".concat(id));},follow:function follow(id){return instance.post("follow/".concat(id));}};export var authAPI={auth:function auth(){return instance.get("auth/me");},login:function login(email,password){var rememberMe=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:false;return instance.post("auth/login",{email:email,password:password,rememberMe:rememberMe});},logout:function logout(){return instance.delete("auth/login");}};export var profileAPI={profile:function profile(id){return instance.get("profile/".concat(id));},getStatus:function getStatus(id){return instance.get("profile/status/".concat(id));},updateStatus:function updateStatus(status){return instance.put("profile/status/",{status:status});}};
